status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Use a CopyOnWriteArrayList in the FailureDetector to track listeners, like the Gossiper does.

Integrated in Cassandra-0.8 #400 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/Cassandra-0.8/400/)
Fix ConcurrentModificationException in FailureDetector
